name: plausible
description: Plausible Analytics is a privacy-focused, self-hosted web analytics platform. It offers lightweight tracking, beautiful reports, and is a privacy-friendly alternative to Google Analytics.
features: Privacy-first analytics: Track website visitors without cookies or personal data collection for GDPR compliance.
Lightweight script: Under 1KB tracking script loads fast and doesn't impact page performance.
Real-time dashboard: View live visitor data and traffic sources with instant updates and clean visualizations.
Goal tracking: Set up custom events and conversion goals to measure user actions and funnel performance.
UTM parameters: Track campaign performance with automatic UTM parameter parsing and attribution.
Referrer analysis: See where traffic comes from with detailed referrer and source breakdowns.
Page analytics: Monitor individual page performance with views, bounce rates, and time on page metrics.
Device and browser stats: Understand your audience with breakdowns by device type, browser, and operating system.
Geographic data: View visitor locations by country and region without compromising individual privacy.
Email reports: Schedule automated email reports with key metrics delivered to stakeholders.
Multiple sites: Manage analytics for multiple websites from a single dashboard with separate tracking.
API access: Export data and integrate with other tools using a comprehensive REST API.
